  .repeatX(2.2, () => mouse.x * 0.4)
  .kaleid(1.2)
  .modulateRotate(o0, 1.1, 2.3, 3.1)
.out(o0)

osc(4.09, 2.4, 0.54)
  .scrollX(4.148, 4.3)
  .repeatX(1.001, 1.155)
  .color(0.1, 0.9, 0.0)
.out(o0)

//21:17:46PM - 03 Sep. 2020

voronoi(1.2, 0.1, () => Math.sin(time * 0.4))
  .modulateScale(voronoi(3.92, () => Math.tan(time * 0.31), 0.0), 0.6)
  .modulateScale(o0,2.127)
  .modulateRotate(solid(0.1, () => mouse.y * 0.86, 0.8, () => mouse.x * 0.9), 3.92, 0.5)
.out(o0)

//21:17:55PM - 03 Sep. 2020

gradient(() => mouse.x * 0.4)
  .blend(gradient(4.72), 0.9)
  .brightness(() => Math.sin(time * 0.54))
  .scrollX(2.4, 4.0)
.out(o0)

//21:18:04PM - 03 Sep. 2020

osc(3.09, 3.303, 4.925)
  .modulateRotate(solid(0.4, 0.1, 0.7, 3.15), 2.53, 0.8)
  .rotate(() => mouse.x * 0.19, () => mouse.y * 0.8)
  .colorama(3.24)
.out(o0)
